Description.Text:
Position Delfino Hotel is fully air-conditioned directly on the beach without crossing roads with direct access to the beach, is located in the open, in a very quiet area just a short walk from the center.
Restaurant Air-conditioned Restaurant.
More Informations Breakfast with sweet and salty buffet. During meals choice among 3 menus, mixed buffet, fruit or dessert. Credit cards accepted:Eurocard/Mastercard and Visa. Outdoor swimming pool open from 08/06/13 to 07/09/13. Periodic adult activities from 25/05/13 to 15/09/13: theme nights, Karaoke, Piano Bar and Dancing nights. Mini club in hotel from 25/05/13 to 15/09/13 during mornings and afternoons for babies from 3 years old. All inclusive prices include: unlimited drinks as water, wine, bier, cola and orangeade, beach service with 1 sun umbrella + 2 sunbeds per room (double single use 1 sun umbrella + 1 sunbeds), for littler babies meat broths, vegetable broths and soups, pediatric consultation service at the hotel free on request, snack for the kids in the hotel from 4 p.m. to 5:30 p.m. with salty and sweet snacks, good night buffet in hotel from 10 p.m. to 12 (midnight) with chamomile tea, herbal teas, hot milk and cookies. check in from 1 p.m. check out within 10 a.m.
